The claim originated from the website te: com, which published an article with the headline "CNN Host Fareed Zakaria Calls For Jihad Rape Of White Women."
The article in question was a word: for-word copy and paste from a satirical website called The People's Cube, known for its political humor.
Snopes: a reputable rumor-busting website, had already declared the claim false in January 2016.
